attributes.action: Make the 29th of March, Brexit Day, a bank holiday!
attributes.background: Brexit has been a shambles no matter what side your on. The stress has taken it all out of us and we would like a break! Please give us this day as a day of rest before we start the next 10 years of negotiations.

rejection.details:
When we look at petitions to decide whether they’re duplicates, we look at whether another petition asks for the same action.

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/236452
